name: Clumsy
effect: This trait bars you from using certain acrobatic abilities such as _Tumble_.

name: Earthguard
effect: While adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_, increase this creature's _Guard_ by 1.

name: Earthwalk
effect: This creature may ignore _Earthen_ Terrain and move through _Earthen_ _Obstacles_ as if they were _Rough_ Terrain.

name: Frostwalk
effect: This creature may ignore _Icy_ Terrain and move through _Icy_ _Obstacles_ as if they were _Rough_ Terrain.

name: Resistance
effect: If a creature has Resistance to a type of Damage, increase their _Guard_ by X against it, where X is the listed Resistance value.

name: Resilient
effect: If a creature is Resilient to a Status, double the value of all Defenses spent to Negate it.

name: Stable
effect: Reduce all _Forced Movement_ effects by X against this creature, where X is the listed Stable value.

name: Strong
effect: When this creature attack an _Obstacle_ with a _Weapon_ or _Martial Arts_ Attack, deal +1 Damage and you may treat any _Forced Movement_ as Damage, converting it at a 1 to 1 rate.

name: Swimmer
effect: Swimming does not cost this creature any additional _Movement_.

name: Aquatic
effect: This creature does not have Disadvantage on Attacks while Swimming and creatures do not have Advantage on Attacks against them. Additionally, this creature may ignore _Earthen_ Terrain.

name: Weakness
effect: If a creature has Weakness to a type of Damage, increase Damage dealt by that type by X, where X is the listed Weakness value.

name: Susceptible
effect: If a creature is Susceptible to a Status, increase the cost to Negate it by 1.

name: Resilient
effect: If a creature is Resilient to a Status, double the value of all Defenses spent to Negate it.
